reviews.review: everything i didnt know i wanted to happen, happened.

One of the best marvel movies I ever seen to many emotions and questions to be answered but it will be in my top 3 marvel movies of all time!! This movie has a lot of action and intense scenes but the story telling could been a little better but it's worth to watch with the family!
It connects all the marvel movies to one! I got to tell this to the cast and everyone who is involved in this movie did a really great job in this movie and I'm glad I went to see it!!

LOVE YOU MARVEL, KEEP IT GOING!!
The past 10 years paid off.  Balancing of each character time on screen is perfect. Love the film  the next 1 year to Avengers 4 will be dreadful but worth the hype.
Didnâ€™t expect the ending to go like that but overall the movie was great

After the ultimately average "Age of Ultron" and the roaring saiccesses of "Thor Ragnarok" and "Black Panther" the Russo Brothers had a Herculean task of bringing the last 10 years MCU movies to its zenith. They have succeeded. This movie feels like a marathon, it hits the ground running and doesn't stop for a breather until "that thing happens" in the final few minutes. The only downside to this is that moments where there should be pause, there is very little. Some breathtaking visuals. Some unexpected throwbacks to previous instalments. There were some seven where my 14 year old self was completely thrown back to the source material. The Russo brothers must have the infinity gauntlet because they bought he comics to life.

After the multiple disappoints of the DC franchise I allowed myself to buy into the hype. I was not disappointed this is better than any comic book movie that's come before.

I caught this opening day and for some reason my review disappeared from the site. This film has that epic scope but never hits the heights predicted by the millions of fanboys in the world. The idea Thanos was going to overcome every single comic book hero was a tough task, they manage to make the threat real by alienating characters but in the end it's a giant tease, the sequel was already announced for May 2019. It was nice seeing all the characters sharing the screen and phase one managed to create a lot of groundwork for this very film to exist. I will reserve my verdict until video but this film was good but far from great for me. The film has that cliff-hanger moment that is going to be solved in the next film, you just know that leaving the cinema. My biggest issues with Marvel are the lack of sacrifice, a film of this scope feels like everybody will be around for the next film. Was it worth the 10 year build up? In some ways yes but ultimately no, it's just another solid action film. I'm now waiting for video before reviewing again. 25/04/2018.

My new favorite movie this one was a blast the coolest thing ever. The movie had a perfect balence of jokes, action, diolog, dramma, and romance. almost everything in this movie was an awsomely well done unpredictable suprise. Gammora dieing was sad due too the fact that she is an esential part of Gaurdians of the galaxy and she is my favorite femmal super hero, and even her death was done perfectly and helped make the story better. Thanose was the best Marvle villian of all time and maby even the best Superhero villian of all time he was so cool and Iso whanted him to have a one on one with the hulk and he did. This movie was defenatly the combination of tbe last 18 films, from referances to places, characters, and relationships. I was suprised and happy that pretty much everyone died except for the original Avengers, Tony, Thor, Cap, Black widow, and   Bruce Banner, ect... Why I was so happy for this is because we know most of the Gaurdians have to come back to life for vol.3 Spider-man has a sequel, and odds are Doctor Strange and Black Panther will have sequels as well. So now we get all the original avengers in the fourth Avengers movie where they will most likly die and the new characters will be resurected. I cant wait for Captian Marvle and Avengers 4 .
Great movie all the way threw, laughter, action, and also great story.....
